product_description: Sustainable Chelsea: 100% Australian Wool, Heavy Duty Commercial, GECA certified & Carbon Neutral
recyclable_percentage_description: Any fabric not fit for re-spinning including fabric attached to other elements such as glue will be shredded for use in upcycled products such roof tiles, insulation, office partitions and stuffing for pet beds.
recycling_process_description: Depending on the fabric and its condition, the fabrics will be recycled differently. Untarnished fabrics can be blended with virgin fibres to produce yarns ideal for manufacturing new fabrics.
end_of_life_program_description: The responsibility of disposing of used fabrics environmentally is up to our customers. The best solution is to provide our clients with legitimate options to dispose of our fabric through the emerging recycling channels now becoming available. By providing our customers with information, we hope it will spark the initiative to close the loop. We are excited to promote UPPAREL as a source for our clients to recycle their offcut fabric from production as well as end of life fabric from dismantled furniture.
water_reduction_techniques: Manufacturing facilities use a mix of harvested rainwater, mains and recirculated water.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: ASSOCIATED EMISSIONS ARE CALCULATED AND CARBON OFFSET TO RENEWABLE FUEL PROJECTS
minimisation_design_strategy: ALL CONSULT WITH YOUR FURNITURE MANUFACTURER OR UPHOLSTERER AS THEY WILL BE ABLE TO GIVE YOU THE BEST ESTIMATE FOR YOR USAGE
other_comments: Sustainable Chelsea is woven using 100% Australian Wool. It is a crepe weave in a solid colour, available in 81 different colourways. This designer fabric is rated Heavy Duty Commercial, it is made in Australia, is GECA certified and is certified Carbon Neutral. It is suitable for all upholstery applications.
type_of_packaging: SLF USE LOW FLAT TUBE PACKAGING WHICH IS NON HALOGENATED PLASTIC.  WE REUSE PLASTIC THAT COMES ON THE ROLLS FROM OUR FABRIC MILLS. WE TAKE BACK CARDBOARD TUBES FROM OUR CUSTOMERS.

minimisation_design_strategy: ALL CONSULT WITH YOUR FURNITURE MANUFACTURER OR UPHOLSTERER AS THEY WILL BE ABLE TO GIVE YOU THE BEST ESTIMATE FOR YOR USAGE
other_comments: Sustainable Persuade is woven using 100% Australian Wool. It is a split twill weave in a solid colour, available in 14 different colourways. This designer fabric is rated Heavy Duty Commercial, it is made in Australia, is GECA certified and is certified Carbon Neutral. It is suitable for all upholstery applications.
type_of_packaging: SLF USE LOW FLAT TUBE PACKAGING WHICH IS NON HALOGENATED PLASTIC.  WE REUSE PLASTIC THAT COMES ON THE ROLLS FROM OUR FABRIC MILLS. WE TAKE BACK CARDBOARD TUBES FROM OUR CUSTOMERS.

product_description: Sustainable Plaad: Australian Wool, Heavy Duty Commerical, GECA Certified & Carbon Neutral
recyclable_percentage_description: Any fabric not fit for re-spinning including fabric attached to other elements such as glue will be shredded for use in upcycled products such roof tiles, insulation, office partitions and stuffing for pet beds.
recycling_process_description: Depending on the fabric and its condition, the fabrics will be recycled differently. Untarnished fabrics can be blended with virgin fibres to produce yarns ideal for manufacturing new fabrics.
end_of_life_program_description: The responsibility of disposing of used fabrics environmentally is up to our customers. The best solution is to provide our clients with legitimate options to dispose of our fabric through the emerging recycling channels now becoming available. By providing our customers with information, we hope it will spark the initiative to close the loop. We are excited to promote UPPAREL as a source for our clients to recycle their offcut fabric from production as well as end of life fabric from dismantled furniture.
water_reduction_techniques: Manufacturing facilities use a mix of harvested rainwater, mains and recirculated water.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: ASSOCIATED EMISSIONS ARE CALCULATED AND CARBON OFFSET TO RENEWABLE FUEL PROJECTS
minimisation_design_strategy: ALL CONSULT WITH YOUR FURNITURE MANUFACTURER OR UPHOLSTERER AS THEY WILL BE ABLE TO GIVE YOU THE BEST ESTIMATE FOR YOR USAGE
other_comments: Sustainable Plaad is woven using 100% Australian Wool. It is a square weave with multi colour yarns, available in 4 colourways. This designer fabric is rated Heavy Duty Commercial, it is made in Australia, is GECA certified and is certified Carbon Neutral. It is suitable for all upholstery applications.
type_of_packaging: SLF USE LOW FLAT TUBE PACKAGING WHICH IS NON HALOGENATED PLASTIC.  WE REUSE PLASTIC THAT COMES ON THE ROLLS FROM OUR FABRIC MILLS. WE TAKE BACK CARDBOARD TUBES FROM OUR CUSTOMERS.
